comment.body: how is it possible to use tags

> [expreview](#comment_1_16GNeHFpN3X1NaWBUJKXJ16eGYAwsfP8qF): you can just copy  index.html js/all.js css/all.css dbschema.json  from this site(in your ZeroNet folder data/19k2nhubaYsDJNPHL6iNs3D2K9Mgj66P4R/) to yourZeroBlog folder ,then you got all these functions. (you may need to restart zeronetand reload your blog's data)
> or you can checkout source at https://github.com/zeronetscript/ZeroBlog/tree/toc_by_tag.

thanks
